title: Mammoth Book of Dinosaurs
description: *Featuring Ice Age Creatures!*Entertaining and educational, these large format books are fully illustrated with 4-color art and line drawings. Each contains a wealth of information about the dinosaurs that roamed the earth millions of years ago and the Ice Age creatures that came after them. Easy-to-read stories and factual information as well as Terms to Remember that will pique young imaginations and enthrall beginning readers and listeners alike
author: Modern Publishing
